Text:
Nice versions, with graphics, and proper table of contents, etc.

Thanks for the upload - especially pre-set for kindle (or kindle app on other devices, like the android phone here) !

are these files actually download from amazon kindle store or are them from a homemade source? (i'm not complaining, i'm just asking for info. most of the great stuff we got at internet are from homemade sources)
Very nice, all I took was the Hobbit, but looked and read great. Thanks very much!
Return of the King stops at Frodo's capture by the orcs after Shelob's lair and there is no more to the book! Extremely disappointed.
